thi class represent the track token

  • Constructor Details

    • TrackToken

      public TrackToken​(int faithPoints, boolean shuffle)
      this constructor create the track token setting the faith points and if the token will cause a shuffle on the stack
      Parameters:
      faithPoints - these are the faith points to set
      shuffle - this is the boolean shuffle to set

    • TrackToken

      public TrackToken​(int faithPoints, boolean shuffle, java.lang.String png)
      this constructor is the same of cli constructor but has one more attribute; the png. This constructor is used for gui.
      Parameters:
      faithPoints - this attribute is the same as that of the other constructor
      shuffle - this attribute is the same as that of the other constructor
      png - this attribute contains the image linked to the token
